name: ctoexpert-marketplace
description: Professional cloud architecture and cybersecurity advisory tools by CTOexpert

plugins.name: cloud-diagram
plugins.description: Generate multi-cloud architecture diagrams (Azure, AWS, GCP, K8s, on-prem) as PNG images with official provider icons. Supports 2000+ node types across 16 providers.

plugins.name: cybersorted
plugins.description: Security and enterprise architecture advisory for CISOs, CTOs, CPOs, Security Architects, Security Engineers, and Enterprise Architects. Threat modeling, compliance mapping, code review, maturity assessments, and tabletop simulations.
